verses.verse: <S%G3972>Paul,<s%> <S%G2822>called<s%> [as] an <S%G652>apostle<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> by the <S%G2307>will<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> and <S%G4988>Sosthenes<s%> our <S%G80>brother,<s%>

to the <S%G1577>church<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> which is at <S%G2882>Corinth,<s%> to those who have been <S%G37>sanctified<s%> in <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> <S%G40>saints<s%> by <S%G2822>calling,<s%> with <S%G3956>all<s%> who in <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G5117>place<s%> <S%G1941>call<s%> upon the <S%G3686>name<s%> of our <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> their [Lord] and ours: <S%G1473><s%>
<S%G5485>Grace<s%> to you and <S%G1515>peace<s%> from <S%G2316>God<s%> our <S%G3962>Father<s%> and the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>

I <S%G2168>thank<s%> my <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3842>always<s%> <S%G4012>concerning<s%> you, for the <S%G5485>grace<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> which was <S%G1325>given<s%> you in <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%>
that in <S%G3956>everything<s%> you were <S%G4148>enriched<s%> in Him, in <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3056>speech<s%> and <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G1108>knowledge,<s%>
<S%G2531>even<s%> as the <S%G3142>testimony<s%> concerning <S%G5547>Christ<s%> was <S%G950>confirmed<s%> in you,

<S%G5620>so<s%> that you are not <S%G5302>lacking<s%> in <S%G3367>any<s%> <S%G5486>gift,<s%> <S%G553>awaiting<s%> <S%G553>eagerly<s%> the <S%G602>revelation<s%> of our <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%>

<S%G3739>who<s%> shall <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G950>confirm<s%> you to the <S%G5056>end,<s%> <S%G410>blameless<s%> in the <S%G2250>day<s%> of our <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>

<S%G2316>God<s%> is <S%G4103>faithful,<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> you were <S%G2564>called<s%> into <S%G2842>fellowship<s%> with His <S%G5207>Son,<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> our <S%G2962>Lord.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> I <S%G3870>exhort<s%> you, <S%G80>brethren,<s%> by the <S%G3686>name<s%> of our <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> that you <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G846>agree,<s%> <S%G3004><s%> and there be <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G4978>divisions<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> you, but you be <S%G2675>made<s%> <S%G2675>complete<s%> in the <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G3563>mind<s%> and in the <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G1106>judgment.<s%>
For I have been <S%G1213>informed<s%> <S%G4012>concerning<s%> you, my <S%G80>brethren,<s%> by Chloe's [people,] that there are <S%G2054>quarrels<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> you.

<S%G1161>Now<s%> I <S%G3004>mean<s%> <S%G3778>this,<s%> that <S%G1538>each<s%> <S%G1538>one<s%> of you is <S%G3004>saying,<s%> "I <S%G1510>am<s%> of <S%G3972>Paul,<s%>" and "I of <S%G625>Apollos,<s%>" and "I of <S%G2786>Cephas,<s%>" and "I of <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>"

Has <S%G5547>Christ<s%> been <S%G3307>divided<s%>? <S%G3972>Paul<s%> was not <S%G4717>crucified<s%> for you, was he? <S%G2228>Or<s%> were you <S%G907>baptized<s%> in the <S%G3686>name<s%> of <S%G3972>Paul<s%>?
I <S%G2168>thank<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> that I <S%G907>baptized<s%> <S%G3762>none<s%> of you <S%G1508>except<s%> <S%G2921>Crispus<s%> and <S%G1050>Gaius,<s%>
that <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G5100>man<s%> should <S%G3004>say<s%> you were <S%G907>baptized<s%> in my <S%G3686>name.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> I did <S%G907>baptize<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> the <S%G3624>household<s%> of <S%G4734>Stephanas;<s%> <S%G3062>beyond<s%> that, I do not <S%G3609>know<s%> <S%G1487>whether<s%> I <S%G907>baptized<s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> <S%G243>other.<s%>

For <S%G5547>Christ<s%> did not <S%G649>send<s%> me to <S%G907>baptize,<s%> but to <S%G2097>preach<s%> the <S%G2097>gospel,<s%> not in <S%G4678>cleverness<s%> of <S%G3056>speech,<s%> that the <S%G4716>cross<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%> should not be <S%G2758>made<s%> <S%G2758>void.<s%>

For the <S%G3056>word<s%> of the <S%G4716>cross<s%> is to <S%G3588>those<s%> who are <S%G622>perishing<s%> <S%G3472>foolishness,<s%> but to us who are being <S%G4982>saved<s%> it is the <S%G1411>power<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

For it is <S%G1125>written,<s%> "I will <S%G622>destroy<s%> the <S%G4678>wisdom<s%> of the <S%G4680>wise,<s%> And the <S%G4907>cleverness<s%> of the <S%G4908>clever<s%> I will <S%G114>set<s%> <S%G114>aside.<s%>"

<S%G4226>Where<s%> is the <S%G4680>wise<s%> <S%G4680>man<s%>? <S%G4226>Where<s%> is the <S%G1122>scribe<s%>? <S%G4226>Where<s%> is the <S%G4804>debater<s%> of <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G165>age<s%>? Has not <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3471>made<s%> <S%G3471>foolish<s%> the <S%G4678>wisdom<s%> of the <S%G2889>world<s%>?

For <S%G1894>since<s%> in the <S%G4678>wisdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> the <S%G2889>world<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> its <S%G4678>wisdom<s%> did not [come to] <S%G1097>know<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> was well-pleased <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G3472>foolishness<s%> of the <S%G2782>message<s%> <S%G2782>preached<s%> to <S%G4982>save<s%> <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G4100>believe.<s%>
For <S%G2532>indeed<s%> <S%G2453>Jews<s%> <S%G154>ask<s%> for <S%G4592>signs,<s%> and <S%G1672>Greeks<s%> <S%G2212>search<s%> for <S%G4678>wisdom;<s%>
but we <S%G2784>preach<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G4717>crucified,<s%> to <S%G2453>Jews<s%> a <S%G4625>stumbling<s%> <S%G4625>block,<s%> and to <S%G1484>Gentiles<s%> <S%G3472>foolishness,<s%>

but to <S%G3588>those<s%> who are the <S%G2822>called,<s%> <S%G5037>both<s%> <S%G2453>Jews<s%> and <S%G1672>Greeks,<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> the <S%G1411>power<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> and the <S%G4678>wisdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

<S%G3754>Because<s%> the <S%G3474>foolishness<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> is <S%G4680>wiser<s%> than <S%G444>men,<s%> and the <S%G772>weakness<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> is <S%G2478>stronger<s%> than <S%G444>men.<s%>

For <S%G991>consider<s%> your <S%G2821>calling,<s%> <S%G80>brethren,<s%> that there were not <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G4680>wise<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G4561>flesh,<s%> not <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G1415>mighty,<s%> not <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G2104>noble;<s%>

but <S%G2316>God<s%> has <S%G1586>chosen<s%> the <S%G3474>foolish<s%> <S%G3474>things<s%> of the <S%G2889>world<s%> to <S%G2617>shame<s%> the <S%G4680>wise,<s%> and <S%G2316>God<s%> has <S%G1586>chosen<s%> the <S%G772>weak<s%> <S%G772>things<s%> of the <S%G2889>world<s%> to <S%G2617>shame<s%> the things <S%G2478>which<s%> are <S%G2478>strong,<s%>

and the <S%G36>base<s%> <S%G36>things<s%> of the <S%G2889>world<s%> and the <S%G1848>despised,<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> has <S%G1586>chosen,<s%> the things that are not, that He might <S%G2673>nullify<s%> the things that are,
that <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G3956><s%> <S%G4561>man<s%> should <S%G2744>boast<s%> <S%G1799>before<s%> <S%G2316>God.<s%>

But by His doing you are in <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G1096>became<s%> to us <S%G4678>wisdom<s%> from <S%G2316>God,<s%> and <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> and <S%G38>sanctification,<s%> and <S%G629>redemption,<s%>
that, <S%G2531>just<s%> as it is <S%G1125>written,<s%> "Let him who <S%G2744>boasts,<s%> <S%G2744>boast<s%> in the <S%G2962>Lord.<s%>"
